fixes.name: Pointer 2
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF to DAX IF; returns BLANK() when the condition is not met. Column references use 'table'[column] format.

fixes.name: Current Year 1
fixes.solution_explanation: Tableau parameter mapped to DAX SELECTEDVALUE over the parameter tableâ€™s Display As column; parameters are always measures.

fixes.name: Previous Year Returns
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR _currYear1 = SELECTEDVALUE('Current Year 1'[Display As])
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUM('Sample - Superstore (2)'[Returns count (order date)]),
    FILTER(
        ALL('Sample - Superstore (2)'),
        YEAR('Sample - Superstore (2)'[Order Date]) = _currYear1 - 1
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Parameter-based logic requires a measure. Implemented by summing the column with a filter on YEAR([Order Date]) = parameter - 1.

fixes.name: Rank PY
fixes.dax_expression:
RANKX(
    ALL('Sample - Superstore (2)'),
    CALCULATE(SUM('Sample - Superstore (2)'[Previous Year Sales])),
    ,
    DESC,
    Dense
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Tableau RANK_DENSE with SUM translated to DAX RANKX over ALL of the table, ranking by SUM of [Previous Year Sales] in descending order with dense ties.
